meta.title: React Native to Senior Engineer - 12 Week Roadmap
meta.description: An interactive roadmap for React Native developers to become Senior Mobile Systems Engineers

roadmap.title: PostgreSQL: From Documents to Relations
roadmap.subtitle: Why MongoDB habits hurt you at scale
roadmap.goal: Ace "design a database schema" interview question
roadmap.interviewQuestion: Design a schema for Uber (drivers, riders, trips, payments)
roadmap.deliverable: GitHub repo: nestjs-postgresql-starter with User/Post CRUD, JWT auth, deployed to Railway
mistakes: Installing PostgreSQL but not configuring authentication properly
Skipping EXPLAIN ANALYZE - you cannot optimize what you cannot measure
Using an ORM before understanding raw SQL

tasks.text: Install PostgreSQL 15+ and pgAdmin (visual GUI, similar to MongoDB Compass)
tasks.why: You need local database for experimentation and learning

tasks.text: Understand tables, columns, data types versus MongoDB documents
tasks.why: Relational thinking is fundamentally different from document thinking

tasks.text: Practice SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE until you can write them without looking
tasks.why: These are 80% of your daily queries - muscle memory matters

tasks.text: Master JOINs: understand what foreign keys actually mean
tasks.why: JOINs are where relational databases shine - this is power tool

tasks.text: Learn normalization: 3NF and when to intentionally denormalize for performance
tasks.why: Normalization prevents data anomalies; denormalization speeds up reads

tasks.text: Window functions: ROW_NUMBER, RANK, LEAD, LAG - SQL power tools
tasks.why: Window functions solve problems that are painful in application code

tasks.text: Connect PostgreSQL to NestJS with Prisma - your first integration
tasks.why: Prisma is modern standard for TypeScript database access

roadmap.title: Advanced SQL & Database Architecture
roadmap.subtitle: Beyond basic queries - think like a DBA
roadmap.goal: Optimize slow queries and design scalable schemas
roadmap.interviewQuestion: How would you optimize a database with 100M users?
roadmap.deliverable: Optimized database schema with indexes, migrations, and performance tests
mistakes: Not using indexes properly - most common performance killer

tasks.text: Master indexes: B-tree, hash, GIN, and when to use each
tasks.why: Indexes are the single biggest performance lever in databases

tasks.text: EXPLAIN ANALYZE: Read query plans like a senior engineer
tasks.why: You cannot optimize what you cannot measure

tasks.text: Database migrations: Version control your schema changes
tasks.why: Production databases evolve - migrations keep them consistent

tasks.text: Connection pooling: PgBouncer and why you need it
tasks.why: Every production app needs connection pooling

tasks.text: Transactions: ACID properties and isolation levels
tasks.why: Understand data consistency at the database level

tasks.text: Build a REST API with NestJS + PostgreSQL from scratch
tasks.why: Apply all concepts in a real project
